Desc.eng: This is Metasurgeon Agrippa 723-Theta speaking. How can I assist you, Inquisitor?
I have a Space Marine on my ship with grievous injuries. I need a Magos Biologis immediately.
Your request cannot be granted. I suggest that you seek medical assistance elsewhere.
I’m on a special assignment from the Caligari Conclave. I must insist, Genetor. Don’t make me ask twice.
Allow me to clarify. The Magos Biologis with the required skill set is unavailable. Current status: assigned to priority-level research for atonement and gathering of sacred data.
Where can I find this Magos Biologis?
Our brethren have been studying an epidemic on the Saint Abelard Relay Station. We lost contact with the station recently…
